summary.span: 使用 draw、push 和 pop 命令描述可视内容。

span.span: Describes visual content using draw, push, and pop commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用填充具有可视内容的或。 Use a to populate a or a with visual content. 尽管绘图方法看起来类似于类型的绘制方法, 但它们的工作方式非常不同 : 与保留模式图形系统一起使用, 而类型则与即时模式一起使用图形系统。Although the draw methods appear similar to the draw methods of the type, they function very differently: is used with a retained mode graphics system, while the type is used with an immediate mode graphics system. 使用对象的绘制命令时, 实际上存储的是一组呈现说明 (尽管具体的存储机制取决于提供的对象类型), 后者将在以后由图形系统使用; 你不会实时绘制到屏幕上。When you use a object's draw commands, you are actually storing a set of rendering instructions (although the exact storage mechanism depends on the type of object that supplies the ) that will later be used by the graphics system; you are not drawing to the screen in real-time. 有关 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 图形系统的工作原理的详细信息, 请参阅[WPF 图形呈现概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md)。For more information about how the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) graphics system works, see [WPF Graphics Rendering Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/wpf-graphics-rendering-overview.md). 永远不会直接实例化, 但可以从某些方法 ( 如和) 获取一个绘图上下文。You never directly instantiate a ; you can, however, acquire a drawing context from certain methods, such as and . ## Examples 下面的示例 从检索, 并使用它来绘制矩形。The following example retrieves a from a and uses it to draw a rectangle. [!code-csharp[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#101)] [!code-vb[drawingvisualsample#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingVisualSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#101)] 下一个示例演示了、 和命令。The next example demonstrates the , , and commands. 从获取 , 并使用控件进行显示。 The is obtained from a and displayed using an control. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PushEffectExample.cs#pusheffectexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PushEffectExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/pusheffectexample.vb#pusheffectexamplewholepage)]

summary.span: 关闭 并刷新内容。

span.span: Closes the and flushes the content.

summary.span: 此后，将不能修改 。

span.span: Afterward, the cannot be modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须先关闭, 然后才能呈现其内容, 但在关闭后, 不能修改它。A must be closed before its content can be rendered, but after it has been closed, it cannot be modified. 此调用不需要弹出所有推送调用。This call does not require all Push calls to have been Popped.

exception.span: 此对象已被关闭或释放。

span.span: This object has already been closed or disposed.

.method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisposeCore() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub DisposeCore ()
protected: abstract void DisposeCore();

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要直接从代码中调用此方法;请改用方法。Do not call this method directly from your code; use the method instead.

exception.span: 该对象已被关闭或释放。

span.span: The object has already been closed or disposed.

summary.span: 使用指定的 和 绘制一个椭圆。

span.span: Draws an ellipse with the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 画笔和笔都可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果画笔为`null`, 则不执行填充。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果笔为`null`, 则不执行任何各种各样。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果笔和画笔均为`null`, 则绘图不可见。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 要绘制的矩形。

span.span: The rectangle to draw.

param.name: radiusX
param.span: 圆角 X 维的半径。

span.span: The radius in the X dimension of the rounded corners.

param.span: 此值将被限制到 0 至 /2 的范围。

span.span: This value will be clamped to the range of 0 to /2.

param.name: radiusY
param.span: 圆角 Y 维的半径。

span.span: The radius in the Y dimension of the rounded corners.

param.span: 此值将被限制到 0 至 /2 的范围。

span.span: This value will be clamped to a value between 0 to /2.

summary.span: 使用指定的 和 绘制一个圆角矩形。

span.span: Draws a rounded rectangle with the specified and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 画笔和笔都可以是`null`。The brush and the pen can both be `null`. 如果画笔为`null`, 则不执行填充。If the brush is `null`, then no fill is performed. 如果笔为`null`, 则不执行任何各种各样。If the pen is `null`, then no stoke is performed. 如果笔和画笔均为`null`, 则绘图不可见。If both the pen and the brush are `null`, then the drawing is not visible.

param.name: player
param.span: 要绘制的媒体。

span.span: The media to draw.

param.name: rectangle
param.span: 要在其中绘制 的区域。

span.span: The region in which to draw .

summary.span: 将视频绘制到指定区域内。

span.span: Draws a video into the specified region.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意, 媒体将被拉伸以适合矩形参数定义的区域。Note that the media will be stretched to fit inside the area defined by the rectangle parameter. 如果矩形和媒体的纵横比不同, 则会发生扭曲。If rectangle and media have different aspect ratios, distortion will occur. 为了更好地控制如何使用媒体来填充区域, 请使用命令绘制矩形, 并用包含媒体的来填充它。For more control over how media is used to fill an area, use the command to draw a rectangle and fill it with a that contains media.

permission.span: 显示您没有或访问的媒体。

span.span: to display media that you do not have or access for.
Associated enumeration: .

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void Pop ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Pop() cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub Pop ()
public: abstract void Pop();
abstract member Pop : unit -> unit

summary.span: 弹出推送到绘制上下文上的最后一个不透明蒙板、不透明度、剪辑、效果或转换操作。

span.span: Pops the last opacity mask, opacity, clip, effect, or transform operation that was pushed onto the drawing context.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 弹出操作后, 它将不再应用于后续的绘图命令。Once an operation is popped, it is no longer applied to subsequent drawing commands. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了该命令的作用。The following example shows the effect of the command. [!code-csharp[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/CSharp/PopExample.cs#popexamplewholepage)] [!code-vb[DrawingContext_procedural_snip#PopExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingContext_procedural_snip/visualbasic/popexample.vb#popexamplewholepage)] 下图显示了此示例的输出:The following illustration shows this example's output: ![用不同的 opacity 值绘制的矩形](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "用不同的 opacity 值绘制的矩形")![Rectangles drawn with different opacity values](~/add/media/graphicsmm-drawingcontextpopexample.gif "Rectangles drawn with different opacity values")

summary.span: 将指定的剪辑区域推送到绘图上下文上。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 剪辑区域适用于所有后续绘图命令, 直到命令删除它。The clip region applies to all subsequent drawing commands until it is removed by the command.
